title: Oral Cancer Prevention and Early Detection: Community Health Workforce Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational knowledge of oral health
context.additional_context: A self-directed learning course operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, aiming to deliver oral cancer prevention information to general citizens through community health activists

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more major risk factors for oral cancer.
Learners can identify and explain five or more early symptoms of oral cancer.
Learners can create two or more oral cancer prevention educational materials for community audiences.
Learners achieve an attendance rate of 80% or higher on a smartphone-based LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
